title: Orange crystal plate armour
data:
{{version030}} {{flavour|A suit of armour carved from transparent orange crystal. It provides remarkable protection for both mind and body. The wearer can even channel psychic energies through the crystal itself, enhancing their magical abilities. However, it's rather heavy...}} [[File:Orange_crystal_plate_armour.png]] '''''the +8 orange crystal plate armour''''' +8 [[crystal plate armour]] [[Archmagi]] [[ego]]
[[Intelligence]] +3
[[Clarity]] ==Desirability== The '''orange crystal plate armour'''{{source ref|0.30.1|art-data.txt|1399}} is a highly enchanted set of crystal plate armour with a few minor bonuses. Melee brutes can appreciate this armour for its amazing AC, and clarity is somewhat useful. While a fully enchanted set of crystal plate or [[gold dragon scales]] will give more AC, using the OCPA saves those [[scrolls of enchant armour]] for other purposes. Casters may ''want'' to wear this armour for its high AC and Archmagi... but for most of the game, it's too heavy to be practical. In a 3-rune game, most characters will be stuck casting low-level spells; even [[extended]] characters can have a rough time casting in it. Only a few fortunate hybrid characters with very high stats ([[Demigod]]s or followers of [[Cheibriados]], perhaps) will be able to take full advantage of what it offers. [[Ziggurat]] divers have the casting ability and [[Armour skill]] to cast with the OCPA. Due to the massive amount of loot, you'll ''eventually'' find this artefact, along with [[strength]] and [[wizardry]] gear. Note that, if you do enough zigs, you might also find a randart +20 crystal plate armour (which'll beat this one). ==History== *Prior to [[0.19]], the orange crystal plate armour had [[sustain abilities]]. *The orange crystal plate armour was added in [[0.15]]. ==References== [[Category:Unrands]] [[Category:Body armour]]
